Access thousands of games in one place: Access thousands of games in one place

valheim.title: Valheim
valheim.description: Fight for survival in the mythical world of Valheim, where legendary Viking warriors live after death. Explore dangerous forests and climb mountains to prove you are worthy of Valhalla.

halflife.title: Half-Life: Alyx
halflife.description: In this new chapter of Half-Life set in virtual reality, you are humanity's only hope against the Combine's increasing power.

traffic.title: Traffic Police
traffic.description: Serve as a traffic police officer, catch those who violate traffic rules, and maintain order in the city.

reddead.title: Red Dead Redemption
reddead.description: Struggle to survive as an outlaw in the last days of the Wild West. An epic adventure where concepts of revenge, honor, and loyalty are tested.

hogwarts.title: Hogwarts Legacy
hogwarts.description: Step into the wizarding world in Hogwarts Legacy. Create your own character and discover ancient secrets in your adventure at the school of wizardry.

Valorant.title: Valorant
Valorant.description: A 5v5 character-based tactical shooter where precise gunplay meets unique agent abilities.

Cyberpunk.title: Cyberpunk 2077
Cyberpunk.description: An open-world action-adventure RPG set in Night City, a megalopolis obsessed with power, glamour and body modification.

You can follow new events from here when: You can follow new events from here when they are added

gameChip.competitiveTooltip: This is a competitive game mode

Bingo.title: Bingo
Bingo.description: Bingo is a game of chance. Mark numbers on your card as they are called. Be the first to complete a pattern and shout 'BINGO!' to win. Enjoy various modes and fun with friends.

howToPlay.0: Join a Bingo lobby or create your own.
howToPlay.2: Listen for numbers called out by the game.
howToPlay.3: If a called number matches one on your card, mark it.

Uno.title: Uno
Uno.description: Uno is a classic card game of matching colors and numbers. It's easy to pick up but hard to put down! Play special action cards to change the game's direction.

howToPlay.1: Match the top card on the discard pile by number, color, or action.
howToPlay.2: If you can't play, draw a card.
howToPlay.3: Use Action cards (Skip, Reverse, Draw Two, Wild, Wild Draw Four) strategically.
howToPlay.4: Shout 'UNO!' when you have one card left.

Chess.title: Chess
Chess.description: Chess is a strategy board game for two players. The objective is to checkmate the opponent's king, putting it under an inescapable threat of capture.

howToPlay.0: Each piece moves in a specific way (Pawn, Rook, Knight, Bishop, Queen, King).
howToPlay.1: White moves first, then players alternate turns.
howToPlay.2: Capture opponent's pieces by landing on their square.
howToPlay.3: The game ends when a king is in checkmate (cannot escape capture).
howToPlay.4: Learn special moves like Castling and En Passant.

HangMan.title: HangMan
HangMan.description: Hangman is a fun word-guessing game. One player thinks of a word, and the other tries to guess it by suggesting letters within a limited number of attempts.

howToPlay.0: A secret word is chosen, represented by blank spaces.
howToPlay.1: Guess letters you think are in the word.
howToPlay.2: Correct guesses reveal the letter's position(s).
howToPlay.3: Incorrect guesses add a part to the hangman drawing.
howToPlay.4: Guess the word before the hangman is fully drawn to win!
